section.name: How To: Use MPXJ with Maven
section.p: MPXJ is developed using Eclipse, with an ant build script to automate various build and deployment tasks. MPXJ does however use Maven to generate its web site and generate artifacts which are uploaded to a public Maven repository. It does this by creating a version of the project using the skeleton Maven directory structure found in the maven directory of the distribution.
